title: What is the best way to bait Jhin?

replies.body: No no, if you set 4 dumplings he won't touch them as it's already at perfection. You have to set 5 so that he's tempted to eat one to bring the total down to 4.
https://media1.giphy.com/media/fQyleXcOh2daw/200.gif#3

I was going to downvote to keep it at 4, but someone beat me to it.

#RIP Thuglife
since everyone heres hanging at 4 upvotes give me some to lol
Now that is humor!
I love how you both have -4 upvotes

Hey, join the action. Your's is now a multiple of 4. (0x4 = 0, ahem).

... what? I'M SORRY IT'S THE BEST I COULD DO WITH ONE VOTE!

EDIT: Sees you at 2 upvotes later. Reverses my vote. ART!!!
downvoted just to get it back to 44 im sorry sir.
44 upvotes, perfection.
This guy has the right idea.
I was just going to post this, but you beat me to it. Sad me, upvote for you :(

Guys, unfortunately, I've discovered a glaring error here:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/aj9d8Np9-petition-to-replace-self-upvote-with-self-downvote

We need this handled pronto.
Ay yo boi can I have 4 downvotes? Because 4 in japanese is death so negative death is life which means I'll become immortal.

Upvoted for ingenuity...

... yes, that backfires, but that's okay, as long as it backfires 3 more times.

Kill him 3 times.

After he goes Legendary, tell him 4 deaths is perfection.

Any true Jhin player would intentionally let himself die.

No, he died 3 times unintentionally. That means he has to die a 4th time unintentionally.

* Yes, it will keep him up at night if he doesn't die unintentionally.
* Yes, it will also keep him up at night if he doesn't know if he subconsciously pushed that 4th one out of impatience, and that it therefore doesn't count, and that therefore he STILL needs to die unintentionally one time, and, now, intentionally as well 3 more times.
* Yes, art is painful.
And now the troll appears to screw with all these 4 upvotes.
who would do this??
i'm the worse kind of person,really.
{{champion:202}}: They're artistically delicious!
{{champion:202}} : Only perfection

> ...is acceptable.

I'm sorry, but this wasn't quite complete. Also it's 4 words now.
You guys lack perfection, let me down/upvote to make it perfect
no. you put 5 so the ocd kicks in and he steps on one to make them 4 again
I love this 4 upvote commentary.
http://img08.deviantart.net/2eaf/i/2013/037/d/d/death_the_kid_____not_symmetrical_by_uchihasakura4-d5bbgrx.jpg
Anime?
Soul Eater
{{champion:202}} "Symmetry is so boring"
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/unanything/images/c/cc/Kid-freakout-o.gif/revision/latest?cb=20151122144109
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/XrxIfKn3kns/hqdefault.jpg
GET THIS MAN TO FOUR UPVOTES STAT!
They are... Trap Dumplings.
There I fixed everyone I could
So... how will we know when this has had 200 downvotes for the sake of art, so that 200 people can reverse their votes, once again, for the sake of art?
